content: स्विद् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A particle of interrogation or inquiry, often implying ‘doubt’, or ‘surprise’, and translateable by ‘what’, ‘hey’. ‘hallo’, ‘can it be that’. It is added to interrogative pronouns in this sense or to give an indefinite sense; कास्विदवगुंठनवती नातिपरिस्फुटशरीरलावण्या <ls>Ś. 5. 13</ls>; <ls>Me. 14.</ls> It is sometimes used disjunctively in the sense of ‘either,’ ‘or’, with नु, उत, वा &c.; see <ls>Ki. 8. 35</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">12. 15</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">13. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">14. 60</ls>; आहो also.

स्विद् {vI.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्विद्यति, स्विदित or स्विन्न) To sweat, perspire; स्विद्यति कूणति वेल्लति <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 41</ls>, <ls>Ku. 7. 77</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1. 35</ls>; स त्वां पश्यति कंपते पुलकयत्यानंदति स्विद्यति <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (स्वेदते, स्विन्न or स्वोदित) {@--1@} To be anointed. {@--2@} To be greasy or unctuous; <ls>Māl. 5. 17.</ls> {@--3@} To be disturbed. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्वेददयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to perspire. {@--2@} To heat.
